founderLetter.title: Founder's Letter
founderLetter.author: Raul
content: I'm Raul. If you've seen me around OCE, you've seen the highs and the lows. I used to add fuel to the wrong fires. I won't pretend that didn't happen. But growth isn't a headline—it's a pattern. I'm changing my pattern.
What I stand on now: OCE is worth protecting. Our talent is real; the noise isn't. Doxxing isn't content—it's damage. Hypocrisy kills scenes. Grudges are dead weight.

People say 'you can't change.' I'm not asking permission. I'm building spaces where change is normal and support is louder than drama. Some will drag me because they 'did it first.' I'm not chasing credit—I'm chasing results. I've been speaking on what's broken in OCE for a minute—including in my music—and I'll keep doing it. Not for clout—for progress.
If you're here to help, I'll take every hand offered. If you're here to gatekeep, stand aside. We're moving either way.
OCE Live Link-Up is clarity over chaos, accountability over ego, and real support over fake outrage. If that's your energy, welcome.

items.question: Who can join OCE Live Link-Up?
items.answer: Anyone from the OCE region interested in Fortnite or Phasmophobia who agrees to follow our safety charter and community rules.

items.question: Is doxxing really a permanent ban?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely. Sharing personal information without consent results in an immediate permanent ban with no appeal process.

items.question: How do I report someone?
items.answer: Use the #reports channel for serious issues, DM a moderator for urgent matters, or use Discord's built-in reporting system.

items.question: How do I find teammates?
items.answer: Check the LFG channels (#lfg-fortnite, #lfg-phas, #lfg-general) and include your platform, skill level, and what you're looking for.

items.question: Are there posting limits?
items.answer: Use common sense. Don't spam, flood channels, or post the same message multiple times. Quality over quantity.

items.question: How do I get announcements pings?
items.answer: Assign yourself the @Announcements role in the #roles channel to get notified of important server updates.
